title: Elon Musk and other tech billionaires are out of control - Economic Times
content: Elon Musk and other tech billionaires are out of control  Economic Times
description: Musks move on Twitter also is hard to square with the concept of fiduciary responsibility. He does not want to buy Twitter to make it a better business — “I dont care about the economics at all,” he recently said — but to realize his ideas about free speech.
